name: Isolation Protocol
description:
What is Isolation Protocol?

Isolation Protocol is a 2D roguelike set on a parasite-infested space prison. As the player, you take on the role of a space-exterminator, using your super-soldier training and a variety of purchasable upgrades to clear the prison of its infestation and uncover the true nature of the crisis!

This project was worked on as a part of my final module at University. It was part of a group project with:

Adam Veasey (Programmer): 
  • Itch paqe: adamjveasey.itch.io/
  • Portfolio: sites.google.com/view/adamveaseywork/work
James Smale (Programmer):
  • Itch page: jamessmaledev.itch.io/
  • Portfolio: jamessmale.info/
Lewis Reynolds (Designer): 
  • LinkedIn: linkedin.com/in/lewis-reynolds-376242203/
